sentences.sContent: When an atheist or agnostic asks me about Sunday School for their children, I recommend exposing their children to a religion.
sentences.sContent_eng: When an atheist or agnostic asks me about Sunday School for their children, I recommend exposing their children to a religion.
sentences.sCn: 当一个无神论者或不可知论者问我星期天学校的事时，我的建议是让孩子去了解宗教。

sentences.sContent: I have mentioned that Locke was very agnostic.
sentences.sContent_eng: I have mentioned that Locke was very agnostic.
sentences.sCn: 我提到过，洛克是个不可知论者。

trans.tranOther: someone who believes that people cannot know whether God exists or not
